EmailTemplate.description: Notification for Managers that Accenture rep has moved Case from 'Compile' to 'Assess'
EmailTemplate.name: GLOBAL ENTITLEMENTS: Accenture Case moved to Assess
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.OwnerFullName} has moved Case to 'Assess'
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello--
{!Case.OwnerFullName} has moved Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} for {!Case.Account} from 'Compile' to 'Assess.'
This case has been moved to the Entitlement Queue for reassignment. To view this case, please click {!Case.Link}.
